com.here.android.mpa.customlocation

Class AreaRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.customlocation.Request
      • com.here.android.mpa.customlocation.AreaRequest

  • public class AreaRequest
extends Request
    Represents an area custom location search request to retrieve user-defined locations previously stored using one or more search filter(s).

    This searches for user-defined locations within a specified bounding box.

    A new AreaRequest should be created for each search.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AreaRequest

        public AreaRequest(int layerId,
                   GeoBoundingBox area)
        Creates an Area Request
        Parameters:
        layerId - Specifies the layer to search.
        area - A GeoBoundingBox specifying the area to search.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if area is invalid.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if area is empty.
